## Challenge 1
v1 <- "Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed."
v2 <- gsub("[[:punct:]]", "", v1)
v3 <- strsplit(v2, " ")
v4 <- c(v3[[1]])
v5 <- v4[seq(from = 1, to = 22, by = 3)]
v5

Primates
